titles: Information, for Sir John, Hall Lord Provost of Edinburgh, Robert Chiesly and James Bowdoun baillies, Sir Archibald Muir, Patrick Halyburtoun, William Meinzies, William Hutcheson, and George Stirling. Against James McLurg, George Clerk, Robert Blackwood, William Paton and others.
author: Hall, John, Sir, fl. 1692.
notes: Against the complaint that there were irregularities in the elections for the magistrates of Edinburgh.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
